Advanced Tools

Enable tools to help focus on content. These can help users with dyslexia, ADHD, and visual impairments.

Accessibility Tips

Best practices for creating accessible web content

Color Contrast

Ensure text has sufficient contrast against background colors (at least 4.5:1 for normal text).

Keyboard Navigation

All interactive elements should be accessible using only a keyboard.

Alt Text

Provide descriptive alt text for all informative images.
